    Getting started with a jekyll, minimal mistakes, and github pages

    03 Jan 2023

    This site was built with jekyll. In my own words, this is a static (as opposed to dynamic? I think so) website generator that is written in the programming language Ruby. Jekyll uses a defined file structure, similar to Ruby on Rails, where there are specific ways to name folders and files (e.g., _layouts/, _includes/, _data/navigation.yml).
